column4: i haven't been on IRC in ages, i don't remember the etiquette.
behave like you normally would among people.. that's about it.. if you have a question about ubuntu just ask
ok, try putting all the needed information in one line, version of ubuntu, problem you're having.. what you've tried.. any error messages etc
if noone answers just ask again in 10 minutes or so, you can use the time to search the forums
